com.backyardbrains.drawing
Class OscilloscopeGLSurfaceView

java.lang.Object
  SurfaceView
      com.backyardbrains.drawing.OscilloscopeGLSurfaceView

public class OscilloscopeGLSurfaceView
extends SurfaceView

OscilloscopeGLSurfaceView is a custom SurfaceView that implements callbacks for its own holder, and manages its own GL drawing thread.

Author:
Nathan Dotz
